title: Game keep freezing at random time in champ slect
body: the game has frozen 2 times for me now in champ select the fist was when it was choosing the roles and the second was after i band and it froze on the other persons ban i couldn't see any chat for the lobby, but i could with my friend not in the lobby this has caused me to lose one of my promos so please fix asap

replies.body:
Hey WarlordsJustKill,

When you say the game is "freezing", do you mean the timer goes down to zero and doesn't do anything, or the entire client stops responding (no visual movement or anything)?

If the game is crashing/freezing or there are graphical issues, I suggest [performing a client repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues).

If the pick/ban phase just stops and won't move and the chat won't load, I suggest doing all the steps on the [Connection Troubleshooting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), and/or launching the game as an admin by right clicking the LoL shortcut and selecting "Run as Administrator". If the issue continues, please provide your connection details to me by downloading the [WinMTR Network Diagnostic Tool](http://winmtr.net/download-winmtr/). Use that to run a traceroute to the following IP's (allow this to run for 5-15 minutes);

> 103.240.227.25
103.240.227.5

Export the results to a text file and paste them here.

Let me know if anything helps.
-DTN
thanks for the reply i will see if it works.
